summary: Live web app with custom domain support (DNS + ic-domains configuration) and responsive navigation including a mobile hamburger menu.
known_issues: Header menu buttons (Documents/Upload/Settings) are missing on mobile; replace with a hamburger menu showing Dashboard, Documents, Upload, Settings.

existing_features.title: Add a mobile navigation control (hamburger menu) in the AppShell header that is shown on small screens (below the current md breakpoint) and contains navigation items for Dashboard, Documents, Upload, and Settings.
Keep role-based behavior consistent with the existing desktop header and route guards: only render the Settings navigation item when the current caller is an admin user.

Ensure the mobile header layout remains usable on small screens: the logo/title block, hamburger control, theme toggle, and account menu must not overlap or overflow horizontally; spacing should adapt for narrow widths.

new_feature_requests.summary: Support connecting the deployed app to a custom domain (DNS records + ic-domains file + redeploy).
Add a mobile hamburger menu in the header containing Dashboard, Documents, Upload, and Settings, adapted for small screens.
